text: @realDonaldTrump How about taking the tax break provisions republicans snuck into the first Coronavirus bill....roughly 170 billion in tax breaks to wealthy real estate investors like our Fake Prez and give that money to small businesses.  You’re a slimy MotherTrucker.  Resign fat Nixon.
